verses.english: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.
verses.hausa: Hannãye biyu na Abũlahabi sun halaka, kuma ya halaka.

verses.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.english: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
verses.hausa: Dũkiyarsa ba ta tsare masa kõme ba, da abin da ya tãra.

verses.english: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
verses.hausa: Zã ya shiga wuta mai hũruwa.

verses.english: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.
verses.hausa: Tãre da matarsa mai ɗaukar itacen (wuta).

verses.english: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
verses.hausa: A cikin kyakkyãwan wuyanta akwai igiya ta kaba (Rãnar ¡iyãma).
